name: Totally No Liars!
description:
Information

2D Platformer Game

Originally made for the Community Game Jam, but it was accidentally deleted. 

The theme was:  'The Game Is A Liar'.

I hope you'll like it! Please leave feedback below.

How to play

Finish all the levels!

Controls
  • Use the A & D / arrow keys to move around.
  • Press W/ Up arrow / Space key to jump.
